Text: Erik Borgman:  He is the biographer of the Flemish theologian Edward Schillebeeckx.

<Text: Erik Borgman:  He was also the President of the International Society for Religion, Literature and Culture.>

Text: Erik Borgman:  He is a member of the Editorial Board and the Presidential Board of "Concilium: International Journal for Theology", also an editor of the Dutch "Tijdschrift voor Theologie" and member of the Third Order of Saint Dominic.
